column5: What are 3D waves? Find out about waves, in 1D, 2D, and 3D.
Find out about how electrons exist as waves in the modern atomic model. See various orbitals in the hydrogen atom using the boundary representation.
column6: Playground | 3D Orbital Explorer, 2D Orbital Explorer, Compare Orbitals

column5: Find out about the two phases in an orbital. Along the way, learn about the wave function, Ψ.
What happens when Ψ is zero? Find out about nodes, specifically radial nodes. Along the way, learn about Ψ² and the principal quantum number.
This checkpoint hasn't been updated yet. Come back later!
Find out about the second type of nodes, angular nodes. Along the way, learn about the azimuthal quantum number and how it relates to the number of radial and angular nodes.
